cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I move around our planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change shape throughout the month.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of hot, glowing gas that gives light and warmth to Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You should wear sunscreen when I'm out.
🔥 I am a star at the center of our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of rock that travels around the Sun. I am home to humans. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am mostly covered in water.
🌍 I have many different countries.
🌱 Life exists on me.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky and icy body that orbits the Sun, often leaving a bright tail behind me. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am sometimes called a dirty snowball.
✨ I can be seen from Earth when I get close to the sun.
🧊 I get smaller as I get closer to the sun.

cosmos.question: I am known as the 'Red Planet' because of my rusty color. What planet am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People have sent rovers to explore me.
🏜️ I have the largest volcano in the solar system.
🔴 My surface is covered in iron oxide.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system, known for my giant red spot. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💨 I'm a gas giant.
🌀 My red spot is a huge storm.
🛰️ Many moons orbit me.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our sun is part of one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
✨ Our solar system lives in the Milky Way.
🔭 They come in many shapes and sizes.

cosmos.question: I am a dwarf planet in the Kuiper Belt, and Pluto's size is quite similar to me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am very far from the sun.
👨‍🚀 I am named after the goddess of discord.
🪐 I am the second-largest known dwarf planet in the Solar System.

cosmos.question: I am a region of space-time exhibiting such strong gravitational effects that nothing—not even particles and electromagnetic radiation such as light—can escape from inside it. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫️ I am often found at the center of galaxies.
🕳️ If you fall into me, you are never coming out.
🌀 Light cannot escape me.

cosmos.question: I am a large cloud of dust and gas in space, often where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can be very colorful.
🌟 Stars are often born inside of me.
💥 I'm made of gas and dust.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥗 I like to eat sea plants.
🐌 I am related to something you might find in a garden, but I live in the sea!

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water.
🐳 Many creatures live in me.
🌊 I have waves.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze through small spaces.
🎨 I can change colors to hide.
🖤 Some people think I am very clever!

ocean.question: I have a fin on my back and sharp teeth, and I am a fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🔪 I am a predator.
🎬 I'm famous in movies.
🦈 Some types of me are great.

ocean.question: I'm a giant mammal that sings in the deep blue. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I use songs to communicate.
🌊 I have a blowhole.
🐋 I'm one of the biggest animals on Earth.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in a reef, hiding amongst the anemones. What am I?

hints.text: 🤡 My colors are bright like a circus performer.
🏠 I live in a stinging plant.
🐠 I am very popular after a famous movie!

ocean.question: I am a very large and flat fish that glides through the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🦩 My shape makes me look like I could almost fly
⚫ I have a long, whip-like tail.
🌊 I live on the ocean floor.

ocean.question: I am made of the skeletons of tiny animals and can be very colorful and full of life. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I'm built over many, many years.
🐠 Many fish like to live in me.
☀️ I am found in warm, shallow waters.

ocean.question: I am a place where a river meets the sea, with a mix of fresh and salt water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Many birds like to visit.
🦀 Many kinds of crabs live here.
🌍 It is a transition zone between land and sea.

ocean.question: I am the movement of ocean water caused by the moon's gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I'm strongest when the moon is full.
⌚ I happen twice a day in many places.
🌊 I cause the water level to rise and fall on the shore.
